entry.content:

let nxt = NXT(name: "Hello NXT") // initialize robot
nxt.rotate(motor: .a, power: 100, angle: 145.0) // change angle of motor
// define sub routine

    nxt.forward(length: 100, turn: 0)
    nxt.wait(msec: 500)
    nxt.reverse(length: 100, turn: 0)
    nxt.wait(msec: 500)
}
// call sub routine
sub.call()
